## auth.UpdateMultiFactorInfoRequest interface

Interface representing common properties of a user enrolled second factor for an `UpdateRequest`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface UpdateMultiFactorInfoRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [displayName](./firebase-admin.auth.updatemultifactorinforequest.displayname.md) | string | The optional display name for an enrolled second factor. |
|  [enrollmentTime](./firebase-admin.auth.updatemultifactorinforequest.enrollmenttime.md) | string | The optional date the second factor was enrolled, formatted as a UTC string. |
|  [factorId](./firebase-admin.auth.updatemultifactorinforequest.factorid.md) | string | The type identifier of the second factor. For SMS second factors, this is <code>phone</code>. |
|  [uid](./firebase-admin.auth.updatemultifactorinforequest.uid.md) | string | The ID of the enrolled second factor. This ID is unique to the user. When not provided, a new one is provisioned by the Auth server. |
